A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Luke spent years learning the force and could barely move a rock before leaving dagobah\, anakin at 9 years old was “too old” to become a Jedi. Yet\, Rey is moving boulders. She learns nothing from Luke and he’s out of his mind. So many continuity errors. I am not against new Star Wars movies. I absolutely loved Rogue One. It is right next to the OT for me. But episode 7 and 8 are so unoriginal and absolutely destroy the myth and mystery behind the force.
